personal_info.name: STAZ CHRISTODOULAKIS
personal_info.title: SENIOR FRONTEND SOFTWARE ENGINEER
personal_info.openness_to_relocation_and_remote_work: Staz has been working remotely most of his career in California and he enjoys remote work. He is also willing to work in an office for the right position and may be willing to relocate under the right circumstances, with relocation assistance being helpful.

work_experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
accomplishments: Collaborated with Project Managers and other teams to design and develop major projects.
Mentored Junior and Mid Level Engineers.

work_experience.title: Frontend Engineer
accomplishments: Worked directly with CEO on technical decisions.
Developed a Chrome Extension for Screen Experience.
Created Data Layer connected to Google Analytics and Tag Manager.

work_experience.title: Freelancing as Web Developer, Frontend Developer
Greek Special Forces Commando Paratrooper
accomplishments: Led troops and carried out missions.
Received awards and trained with elite soldiers.

education.experience: Computer Science Internship at a large-scale news company.

additional_info.background: Staz, short for Anastasis, is Greek and a US Citizen. Specializes in frontend engineering with React and Typescript. Enjoys learning about new technologies, reading, and has a diverse set of interests and skills.
